Package com.deco2800.game.components.player

Class KeyboardPlayerInputComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.input.InputComponent
com.deco2800.game.components.player.KeyboardPlayerInputComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureDetector.GestureListener, InputProcessor
public class KeyboardPlayerInputComponent
extends InputComponent
Input handler for the player for keyboard and touch (mouse) input. This input handler only uses keyboard input.
